description:
Burly, adjustable and light enough for all the adventures you have lined up. The 2-section shaft is made of light, sturdy aluminum that consistently gets the job done.

  • Dual-density plastic grip has ridges to help maintain grip
  • Removable strap is shaped for comfort
  • Secondary grip position allows you to move your hand down when side-hilling
  • Quickflick tab on handle to flick your bindings into ski or hike mode
  • Eyelet to rig a guyline for a tarp
  • Forged aluminum locking mechanism for a solid connection
  • All-Mountain baskets are shaped to handle steep and technical terrain
  • Carbide tips grip well on ice and rock
name: G3 VIA Aluminum Poles
